keyword: calories in an ounce of vodka
title: Calories in an Ounce of Vodka
meta_description: Discover calories in an ounce of vodka, including alcohol content, zero carbs or fat, and quick tweaks for different proofs or mixers.
h1: Calories in an Ounce of Vodka
assumptions: Standard 80-proof (40% ABV) unflavored vodka, distilled spirit, no mixers or additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, proof, and any flavorings; alcohol content affects calorie density. Consult labels for specifics.

quick_answer.text: One ounce of 80-proof vodka provides ~64 kcal, all from alcohol.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Mixed with 1 oz soda water (no calories added)

faqs.q: How many calories in an ounce of vodka?
Does vodka have carbs or sugar?
faqs.a: No, unflavored vodka has 0 g carbs, fiber, or sugarsâ€”calories are purely from alcohol.
Proof (alcohol percentage) is key; higher proof means more calories per ounce.
Yes, straight vodka is keto-friendly with 0 g net carbs, but watch mixers.

faqs.q: How many ounces in a standard shot?
faqs.a: Typically 1.5 fl oz, so about 96 kcal for 80-proof vodka.
